name: Stack the Spire
description:
Three knights are arguing over how to battle. They will have to learn to join their suggestions together to decide what to do.

Build your cards with suggestions from all of them as you venture through the dungeon.

README!

Instructions:

* Drag cards from your hand to the middle card to construct a new joined card. Only the slots on the top will be active. Drag the card to the enemy to activate it.

Active Bugs:

* It appears the card "Dagger Throw" is broken :( Try not to pick it up, using it will cause weird behavior with enemies taking damage.
